text: (qurabaanee ke) oonton ko hamane tumhaare lie allaah kee nishaaniyon mein se banaaya hai. tumhaare lie unamen bhalaee hai. atah khada karake unapar allaah ka naam lo. phir jab unake pahaloo bhoomi se aa lagen to unamen se svayan bhee khao aur santosh se baithanevaalon ko bhee khilao aur maanganevaalon ko bhee. aisee hee karo. hamane unako tumhaare lie vasheebhoot kar diya hai, taaki tum krtagyata dikhao
